about_the_game:
The game is currently in development and is expected to be released soon.

This demo contains some of the basic game play that the full game will feature, the overall reason for releasing this demo is to get feedback and see what people think of the overall quality of the game.

I am solo developer and have been working on this game part time for almost 5 years, the game has gone through many different stages and I am now ready to show the world what I have created.

There is no storyline in the demo version. The full game features cinematic cuts, voice overs and other things.

Please send an email to mail@derpypirates.com if you have any suggestions or bugs you would like to report on the demo.
detailed_description:
The game is currently in development and is expected to be released soon.

This demo contains some of the basic game play that the full game will feature, the overall reason for releasing this demo is to get feedback and see what people think of the overall quality of the game.

I am solo developer and have been working on this game part time for almost 5 years, the game has gone through many different stages and I am now ready to show the world what I have created.

There is no storyline in the demo version. The full game features cinematic cuts, voice overs and other things.

Please send an email to mail@derpypirates.com if you have any suggestions or bugs you would like to report on the demo.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux (Mint 13, Ubuntu 12, Gnome)
  • Processor: 4th Generation Intel® Core™ i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD 4000, Integrated graphics or AMD Radeon/Nvidia GTX
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux (Mint 13, Ubuntu 12, Gnome)
  • Processor: 4th Generation Intel® Core™ i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or AMD Radeon 7750
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MAX OS X Yosemite
  • Processor: 4th Generation Intel® Core™ i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD 4000, Integrated graphics or AMD Radeon/Nvidia GTX
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MAC OS X Manjavo
  • Processor: 4th Generation Intel® Core™ i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or AMD Radeon 7750
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

name: Derpy pirates! Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8
  • Processor: 4th Generation Intel® Core™ i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel® HD 4000, Lower end AMD or Nvidia cards
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 4th Generation Intel® Core™ i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 650 or AMD Radeon 7750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

short_description: A big adventure featuring Captain Bazaar and his crew on their quest to save the world.
